name: Ursa
description:
Welcome to Ursa!


You have been contracted by a mining company to finish setting up some positional beacons on the surface of the planet. You will be provided a standard issue anti-gravity gun to help navigate the difficult terrain of Ursa. Also be sure to watch out for any hidden collectibles along the way!

Features

  • Open World (you can walk all the way around the world)
  • Competitive Leaderboards
  • Hidden Collectibles
  • Achievements
